title: Take
description: Part 2 of the Need series... He broke me.The only man I’ve ever loved. Wrecked me beyond recognition.But I can’t get away from him.Brayden haunts me, persistently. His last name is what he is—a hunter. And I’m his prey.I just want to move on, forget him. But he won’t let me. He’s a whore and I break, letting him in.One hit is a gateway drug, and I’m suddenly unable to stay away. So I take what I need from him. I hate him.I love him.And I don’t even have a fighting chance against him.
author: K.I. Lynn
